block.minecraft.nether_portal.name: Portale del Nether
desc.enigmatica.ie_multiblock_error: Struttura invalida o gamestage mancante. Ricontrolla la struttura e/o ottieni lo Schema Macchine per poter formare il multiblock.
desc.enigmatica.amadron.atum_mineral.lor: Una scorta di minerali da Atum.
desc.enigmatica.amadron.nether_botanical: Una scorta di campioni botanici dal Nether.
desc.enigmatica.amadron.end_botanical.lo: Una scorta di campioni botanici dall'End.
advancements.enigmatica.husbandry.tame_a: Tame every animal there is to tame!
lexicon.mythicbotany.runes.page1: Runes representing the affinities of the $(thing)Nine World$(0) may now be crafted in the $(item) Runic Altar$(0). These new runes unlock great potential though they're dangerous if used carelessly.
lexicon.mythicbotany.runes.runeAlfheim: Alfheim, home to the arboreal cities of the elves.
lexicon.mythicbotany.runes.runeNidavelli: Nidavellir, filled with the great halls of the dwarves.
lexicon.mythicbotany.runes.runeJoetunhei: Jötunheim, the place of origin of all giants.
lexicon.mythicbotany.runes.runeMuspelhei: Muspelheim, a world of flame inhabited by fire giants.
lexicon.mythicbotany.runes.runeNiflheim: Niflheim, rime covered plains home to frost giants.
lexicon.mythicbotany.runes.runeAsgard: Asgard, where the Aesir rule from on-high.
lexicon.mythicbotany.runes.runeVanaheim: Vanaheim, le lussureggianti pianure dove i Vanir si ritrovano a corte.
lexicon.mythicbotany.runes.runeHelheim: Helheim, home to all in the end, the domain of the dead.
lexicon.mythicbotany.infuser.page1: Creating Alfsteel is no trivial accomplishment and the $(l:botania:basics/terrasteel)Terrestrial Agglomeration Plate$() was not up to the task. The elves in Alfheim have devised an improved version capable of channeling the energies necessary for all known mana-alloys. The Mana Infuser will not draw mana from a spark network automatically; a Dominant Augment is required.
lexicon.mythicbotany.infuser.page2: Upgrading the Terrestrial Agglomeration Plate into a Mana Infuser.
lexicon.mythicbotany.infuser.page3: The platform required by the Mana Infuser consists of Gold and Shimmerrock.
lexicon.mythicbotany.infuser.page4: The process for creating Alfsteel is similar to that of Terrasteel, though it uses resources native to Alfheim. It requires a great deal more mana but can be used to create various powerful artifacts.
lexicon.mythicbotany.tools.page1: Trade between worlds has created possibilities never previously dreamt of. The elves have been busy experimenting with the samples they've received. Their long labour has at last born fruit in the form of Alfsteel. Plating Terrasteel with this new alloy in a Smithing Table greatly enhances its already potent nature.
lexicon.mythicbotany.tools.page2: It takes no small quantity of Alfsteel to plate Terrasteel implements.
lexicon.mythicbotany.tools.page3: Nimble as the minds who devised it, and equally sharp.
lexicon.mythicbotany.tools.page4: Capable of felling entire trees with a single strike, the Alf Truncator can also aid in collecting items by pressing Sneak + Right Click.
lexicon.mythicbotany.tools.page5: A more voracious tool than the Terrashatterer that it's made from, breaking a cubic area for the same effort as before.
lexicon.mythicbotany.tools.page6: The elves are well known for their magic and this helm is no exception, bestowing limited telekenises upon the wearer.$(p)Ancient Wills can also be bonded to it as with the Terrasteel Helm.
lexicon.mythicbotany.tools.page7: Remain firmly grounded, while wearing this Chestplate even the strongest attack will struggle to displace the wearer.
lexicon.mythicbotany.tools.page8: Mana courses through Alfsteel Leggings, making the wearer fleet of foot.
lexicon.mythicbotany.tools.page9: Questa armatura sembra sorprendentemente leggera, nonostante la sua apparente grossezza. Saltare è più facile di prima.
lexicon.mythicbotany.manaband.title: Alfsteel Mana Bands
lexicon.mythicbotany.manaband.page1: Placcare una $(l:botania:baubles/mana_ring)Greater Band of Mana$() con Alfsteel nel tavolo da fabbro aumenta notevolmente la sua capacità di mana, duplicando approssimativamente la già notevole riserva.
lexicon.mythicbotany.manaband.page2: Similarly, the $(l:botania:baubles/aura_ring)Greater Band of Aura$() can be plated to grant a noticeable boost to its mana production.
lexicon.mythicbotany.pylon.title: Alfsteel Pylons
lexicon.mythicbotany.pylon.page1: The secret forge of Alfheim.$(p)Merely laying a damaged tool enchanted with Mending on an Alfsteel Pylon is enough for it to erupt in a fury of mana fueled flame, burning the mana stored within to quickly repair the item.$(p)Aim a Mana Spreader at it to deliver the necessary mana.
lexicon.mythicbotany.wand.title: Dreamwood Wands
lexicon.mythicbotany.wand.page1: For the discerning Botanist.$(p)Like Livingwood, Dreamwood may also be used to craft a Wand of the Forest.
lexicon.mythicbotany.muspelheim.page1: Conferisce al portatore l'immunità alle fiamme della fucina di Muspelheim, oltre a infiammare i nemici che osano colpire.
lexicon.mythicbotany.niflheim.page1: Il portatore può resistere al potere di frantumazione del ghiaccio e della pietra con questa fascia e un'aura glaciale è emana da essa, rallentando tutti coloro che si trovano nel suo raggio d'azione.
lexicon.mythicbotany.generating.title: Generating Flora
lexicon.mythicbotany.generating.page3: At times, a Mana Spreader simply cannot keep up with mana as it's being produce. Generating Flora can instead be linked to a Mana Collector, allowing the mana to flow directly into a Spark network. A Spark and a Recessive Augment must be placed on the device.
lexicon.mythicbotany.functional.title: Functional Flora
lexicon.mythicbotany.functional.page1: The Exoblaze channels mana into nearby Brewing Stands, empowering them to work without fuel.
lexicon.mythicbotany.functional.page2: Drawing from deep aquifers to fill nearby cauldrons and Petal Apothecaries.
lexicon.mythicbotany.functional.page3: Mettere Piglins e Hoglins a proprio agio, impedendo la loro zombificazione mentre il mana viene fornito.
bountiful.decree.miner.name: Miner
bountiful.decree.hunter.name: Hunter
bountiful.decree.dungeon.name: Dungeon Dweller
bountiful.decree.millwright.name: Millwright
bountiful.decree.electrician.name: Electrician
bountiful.decree.machinist.name: Machinist
bountiful.decree.demolisher.name: Demolisher
bountiful.decree.witch.name: Witch
bountiful.decree.druid.name: Druid
tooltips.enigmatica.normal.apiaries_craf: Crafting this will return any bees in the hives/apiaries used ONLY if all hives/apiaries have been previously placed in-world and recieved NBT.
tooltips.enigmatica.expert.apiary: Craftare questo non ti restituirà le api al suo interno. Assicurati di rimuoverle prima di craftarlo!
tooltips.enigmatica.expert.liquid_meat: La Carne Liquida può essere ottenuta "processando" le mucche.
tooltips.enigmatica.expert.pink_slime: Lo slime rosa può essere raccolto da un Wither Rosa usando un Fluid Laser.
tooltips.enigmatica.expert.machinery_sch: Sblocca l'abilità di formare le seguenti strutture:
tooltips.enigmatica.expert.medium_machin:
- Automated Engineer's Workbench
- Diesel Generator
- Excavator
- Fermenter
- Metal Press
- Mixer
- Pumpjack
- Refinery
- Sawmill
- Squeezer
tooltips.enigmatica.expert.heavy_machine:
- Arc Furnace
- Assembler
- Coker Unit
- Crusher
- Distillation Tower
- Lightning Rod
- Sulfur Recovery Unit
descriptions.enigmatica.expert.nebu_hamm: Capace di scomporre i Godblock in artefatti di Atum.
descriptions.enigmatica.expert.apiary: Craftare questo non ti restituirà le api al suo interno - assicurati di rimuoverle prima di craftarlo!
descriptions.enigmatica.expert.small_sto: La creazione è disabilitata in Expert, inizia con la Parte di Stoccaggio da 16k.
descriptions.enigmatica.expert.small_flu: La creazione è disabilitata in Expert, inizia con la Parte di Stoccaggio Fluidi da 1024k.
descriptions.enigmatica.expert.stage_unl: Ottenere questo oggetto per la prima volta sblocca una Fase di gioco. Se la fase viene revocata o non sbloccata, fai Clic Destro con questo oggetto in aria per riottenerlo.
descriptions.enigmatica.base.cheese_slic: Obtained by right-clicking a Wheel of Cheese.
descriptions.enigmatica.base.ham: Obtained by killing Pigs or Hoglins with a knife.
descriptions.enigmatica.base.stardust: Obtained by left-clicking a Starmetal Ingot in-world with a Starmetal Cutting Tool. See the Astral Tome for more information.
descriptions.enigmatica.base.constructio: Obtained by breaking a Dense Construction Block with a Pickaxe.
descriptions.enigmatica.base.uraninite: Il Minerale di Uraninite è stato rimosso e non genera in natura. Per ottenere l'Uraninite, usa la ricetta dell'Energizing Orb di Powah.
descriptions.enigmatica.base.blizz: The Blizz spawns naturally in cold biomes. Mechanical Dirt and Nocturnal Powder work wonders for farming them.
descriptions.enigmatica.base.blitz: Il Blitz genera naturalmente in biomi caldi e secchi. La Mechanical Dirt e la Polvere Notturna sono perfetti per farmarli.
descriptions.enigmatica.base.basalz: Il Basalz genera naturalmente in biomi aridi, come la Mesa. La Mechanical Dirt e la Polvere Notturna sono perfetti per farmarli.
descriptions.enigmatica.base.emerald_ice: Found naturally in Ice Starfields in the End, it can also be created from water placed next to Ancient Emerald Ice.
descriptions.enigmatica.base.dense_emera: Found naturally in Ice Starfields in the End, it can also be created from Emerald Ice placed next to Ancient Emerald Ice.
descriptions.enigmatica.base.ancient_eme: Found naturally in Ice Starfields in the End, it can convert adjacent water blocks to Emerald Ice and those to Dense Emerald Ice.
descriptions.enigmatica.base.habanero: Un drop rarissimo dalla coltivazione di Peperoni.
descriptions.enigmatica.base.fusion_reac:
Il Reattore a Fusione è stato depotenziato molto pesantemente.
Produce solo 60mila-250mila rf/t passivamente, ma ha il potenziale di un output molto migliore con una o più Turbine a Vapore.
descriptions.enigmatica.base.infinity_to: Nove trilioni è tanto. Veramente tanto. Manco ci crederai a quanto sia enormemente, incomprensibilmente grande.
A meno che tu non voglia aspettare un paio di secoli, caricare questo strumento non è possibile con mezzi convenzionali. Alcuni dicono che la risposta sia nella Nucleosintesi.
descriptions.enigmatica.base.brown_mushr: Plant a Brown Mushroom on Rich Soil in darkness to grow mushroom colonies, which may be broken for a nice yield.
descriptions.enigmatica.base.red_mushroo: Plant a Red Mushroom on Rich Soil in darkness to grow mushroom colonies, which may be broken for a nice yield.
descriptions.enigmatica.base.integratedt: Max Energy Transfer Rate has been limited to 65,536 FE per tick.
Max Fluid Transfer Rate has been limited to 65,536 mb per tick.
descriptions.enigmatica.base.nautilus_sh:
Obtained by killing Nautilus, found in Warm Oceans.
 
Also obtained from Embedded Ammonite, found at any Y level under Oceans and Beaches.
descriptions.enigmatica.base.twisted_sap: Ottenuto lanciando arboscelli attraverso un Portale del Nether dall'Overworld
descriptions.enigmatica.base.warpstone: Ottenuto lanciando blocchi di argilla attraverso un Portale del Nether dall'Overworld
descriptions.enigmatica.base.warped_cact: Ottenuto lanciando cactus attraverso un Portale del Nether dall'Overworld
descriptions.enigmatica.base.warped_cora: Ottenuto lanciando un corallo qualsiasi attraverso un Portale del Nether dall'Overworld
descriptions.enigmatica.base.chiseled_ab: May be Charged by Right-Clicking with a Heart of the Sea. Used to power Abyssaline blocks.
descriptions.enigmatica.base.abyssaline: Powered by placing next to a Charged Chiseled Abyssaline Bricks. Power is transmitted through to other Abyssaline blocks.
descriptions.enigmatica.base.acacia_tote: Fai Clic Destro con un'ascia per cambiare la facciata.
descriptions.enigmatica.base.silk_fiber: Obtained by killing Silk Moths which are spawned by Silk Moth Nests.
descriptions.enigmatica.base.universal_c: Obtained by placing Coralstone next to living coral and waiting. Requires Silk Touch to harvest.
descriptions.enigmatica.base.coralstone: Posiziona accanto a del corallo vivo e aspetta che si infondi.
descriptions.enigmatica.base.dead_corals: Ottenuto rompendo la Infused Coralstone senza Tocco di Seta.
descriptions.enigmatica.base.quark_cryst:
Will grow up to four blocks tall if placed deep underground. Will emit particles while growing.
 
May sprout Corundum Clusters as well.
Grows occasionally on Corundum Blocks when grown underground.
descriptions.enigmatica.base.bottled_clo: Ottenuta facendo Clic Destro con una bottiglia di vetro in aria in altezza 126 - 132.
descriptions.enigmatica.base.overworld_a:
Ottenuta facendo Clic Destro con una Bottiglia e Sughero nell'aria nell'Overworld o nell'Atum. Questo consuma Aura nell'area.

Può essere automatizzato con un Dispenser.
descriptions.enigmatica.base.end_aura_bo:
Ottenuta facendo Clic Destro con una Bottiglia e Sughero nell'aria nell'End o nell'Undergarden. Questo consuma Aura nell'area.

Può essere automatizzato con un Dispenser.
descriptions.enigmatica.base.nether_aura:
Obtained by Right-Clicking a Bottle and Cork in the air in the Nether. This action removes Aura from the area.
 
Can be automated using a Dispenser.
descriptions.enigmatica.base.quark_root_:
Drops occasionally when breaking Cave Roots.
 
Cave Roots may be crafted and grown just like Vines, though they require low light to grow.
descriptions.enigmatica.base.quark_root: May be crafted and grown just like Vines, though they require low light to grow.
descriptions.enigmatica.base.phantoplasm: Drop del Bellringer. Crafta una Haunted Bell per evocare.
descriptions.enigmatica.base.mossy_tooth: Drops from Swampjaw. Craft a Fossil Bait to summon.
descriptions.enigmatica.base.fortunes_fa: Drops from Dame Fortuna. Craft a Devil's Ante to summon.
descriptions.enigmatica.base.ectoplasm: Drop dei Wraith nelle rovine sabbiose dell'Atum.
descriptions.enigmatica.base.firework_ro: Shapeless Crafting: One paper and at least one gunpowder.

Adding more gunpowder increases the duration of the rocket.
Up to three gunpowder or up to seven firework stars can be added.
descriptions.enigmatica.base.firework_st: Shapeless Crafting: One gunpowder and at least one dye.

Up to eight dyes can be added.
One head, gold nugget, feather, or fire charge can be added to set a shape.
A diamond and/or a glowstone dust can be added with any of the other ingredients.
descriptions.enigmatica.base.dragon_egg:
Si possono ottenere altre uova evocando nuovamente l'Ender Dragon.

Per evocarlo, piazza un Cristallo dell'End su ogni lato del portale di bedrock nell'End, come faresti in vanilla.
descriptions.enigmatica.base.soul_shard:
Obtained by performing a Crystallization Ritual near undead mobs. The ritual can be found in the Ars Ecclesia.
 
Alternatively obtained by killing undead mobs with a Reaper's Scythe.
descriptions.enigmatica.base.anputs_fing: Found occasionally growing beneath Deadwood Trees. Requires darkness to grow.
descriptions.enigmatica.base.heater: Può essere utilizzato per produrre calore per le macchine della PneumaticCraft.
descriptions.enigmatica.base.logic_circu:
Usato in una Logic Unit per creare Logica di redstone avanzata.

Craftato in un Engineer's Circuit Table. Richiede Circuit Backplane e Copper Wire o Lead Wire. I Vacuum Tube sono richiesti per tutti gli operatori logici tranne SET.
descriptions.enigmatica.base.hemolymph_s:
Obtained by defeating the Warped Mosco.
 
Warped Mosco are creatures of nightmare created when a Crimson Mosquito sucks the blood of a Mungus covered in Warped Fungus.
Mungus may be summoned through the Altar of Birthing, while Crimson Mosquitos may be created by bringing a Fly into the Nether.
descriptions.enigmatica.base.gem_crystal:
Formed by dropping a Rock Crystal or Celestial Crystal in Liquid Starlight with an Illumination Powder.
 
Different varieties form at different times of the day.
descriptions.enigmatica.base.celestial_c: Formed by dropping a Rock Crystal or Celestial Crystal in Liquid Starlight with a Stardust.
If grown on Starmetal Ore, the growth rate is increased. The ore may revert during this process, so linking a Collector Crystal to it is important to convert it back.
descriptions.enigmatica.base.weak_tau: Trovato nelle casse del Reame Demoniaco.
descriptions.enigmatica.base.strong_tau: Prodotto coltivando il Tau vicino a dei mob.
descriptions.enigmatica.base.unholy_symb: Prodotto intonando il Tocco dell'Oscurità su un Inlay di Pewter droppato a terra.
descriptions.enigmatica.base.beehive: Tiered Beehives have been depreciated. Use the Hive Upgrade items on nests found in the world instead. Tiered Beehives can be converted to Hive Upgrades in a crafting grid.
descriptions.enigmatica.base.flare: Splash a Phantom with a Potion of Insomnia to convert it to a Flare.
descriptions.enigmatica.base.cloche:
Fertilizzanti disponibili:

Farina d'ossa: 1,25x
Floral Fertilizer: 1,5x
Green Fertilizer: 1,5x
Fertilizer (Industrial Foregoing): 1,7x
Red Fertilizer: 2,0x
Phyto-Gro: 3,0x
descriptions.enigmatica.base.dragon_scal: Only drops from Ender Dragons after the first one has been killed.
descriptions.enigmatica.base.dankstorage: Sneak Right Click to upgrade a Dank installed in a Dock.
descriptions.enigmatica.base.dusty_mummb: La Dusty Mumbee può essere trovata nei Sarcofagi dei Faraoni.
descriptions.enigmatica.base.slime_in_a_: Scoop up a small slime in an empty bucket.
descriptions.enigmatica.base.mysterious_:
Summons a Void Worm when tossed into the void in The End.
 
Place a Crimson Mosquito Larva inside a Capsid to obtain.
descriptions.enigmatica.base.capsid:
Dropped by Enderiophage.
 
Enderiophage may be found in the wild in the End Midlands biome. They may also be called forth by consuming Otherworldly Honey.
descriptions.enigmatica.base.sanguine_am: For crafting steps, refer to the Sanguine Items section under Rituals in the Ars Ecclesia.
descriptions.enigmatica.base.papyrus_pla: Commonly found growing in Oasis Biomes in Atum. Grows like Sugar Cane on Strange Sand or Fertile Soil.
descriptions.enigmatica.base.infused_woo: Ottenuto gettando qualsiasi tronco in Starlight liquida.
descriptions.enigmatica.base.thief_hood: Può essere riparato con la pelle di coniglio.
descriptions.enigmatica.base.golden_leav: Obtained by using Brilliant Fiber on leaves. Allow to spread for best effect.
descriptions.enigmatica.base.masterfulma: Questa struttura sarà difficile da costruire manualmente.

Usa le pattern di Building Gadgets incluse nella cartella "building_gadgets_patterns" di Enigmatica 6.

Si può ruotare, ma non riflettere.

A note on the values shown in recipes for these machines:
● Forge Energy is consumed per tick
● Pneumatic Air is consumed per tick and must be over 10 bar
● Astral Starlight is consumed per tick
● Fluids are consumed or created per tick
● Items are consumed or created at the end of a craft
● Mana is consumed at the start of a craft or created at the end
descriptions.enigmatica.base.break_preve: When applied to a tool in an anvil, the tool will just stop working when durability runs out, instead of being destroyed.
descriptions.enigmatica.base.belt_of_lev: When equipped in the belt slot, hold the sneak key while airborne to float.
descriptions.enigmatica.base.refined_rad: Chromatic Compound absorbs light when dropped in the world, transforming into Refined Radiance. Charges slowly from ambient light, faster by consuming nearby light emitting blocks, and instantly when dropped onto an active beacon.
descriptions.enigmatica.base.shadow_stee: Chromatic Compound absorbs darkness when dropped into the void, returning as Shadow Steel, floating back up out of the void shortly after falling into the depths.
descriptions.enigmatica.base.projectile_:
Proiettili validi:
● Palle di neve
● Uova
● Frecce
● Cariche di fuoco
● Frecce spettrali

● Perle Ender
● Sputi di Lama
● Bottiglie di XP
● Proiettili di Shulker
● Tridenti
descriptions.enigmatica.base.birth_spiri: Ottenuto naturalmente accoppiando animali in zone con Aura elevata.
descriptions.enigmatica.base.hose_pulley:
Si può usare per pompare infinitamente i seguenti:

● Lava
● Acqua
● Petrolio greggio
● Virulent Mix
● Cioccolata
● Chorus Liquido
● Resina di Menril
● Sangue
● Slime
● Enderslime
● Skyslime
descriptions.enigmatica.base.honey_glaze: Ottenuto facendo Clic Destro con una ciotola su un prosciutto ricoperto di miele posizionato (Honey Glazed Ham).
descriptions.enigmatica.base.stuffed_pum: Ottenuto facendo Clic Destro con una ciotola su una zucca ripiena posizionata.
descriptions.enigmatica.base.roast_chick: Ottenuto facendo Clic Destro con una ciotola su un pollo arrosto posizionato.
descriptions.enigmatica.base.brewing_bar:
Usato per preparare diverse bevande alcoliche.

● Birra
● Cauim
● Sidro
● Idromele
descriptions.enigmatica.base.disabled_pl: Questo oggetto è stato disabilitato, se sei riuscito a ottenerlo per favore segnalalo sul tracker di Enigmatica 6: https://github.com/EnigmaticaModpacks/Enigmatica6/issues
descriptions.enigmatica.base.can_be_dyed: Can be dyed through crafting or by right clicking it with dye in-world.
descriptions.enigmatica.base.generatable: Can be generated in a Vanilla Cobblestone Generator. The block below where the Cobblestone generates needs to be a Block of Iron.
Can be generated in a Vanilla Stone Generator. The block below where the Stone generates needs to be a Block of Diamond.
descriptions.enigmatica.base.framed_draw:
Must be painted with any block to be used. To paint, put in any crafting grid with one block directly above and to its left diagonally.
You can also put a different block directly on top of the drawer and/or directly to its left to customize it even further!
descriptions.enigmatica.base.beverages:
Brewed by right-clicking %s into a Brewing Barrel.
Grants the imbiber %s.
tooltips.enigmatica.base.integratedtunne: Max Fluid Transfer Rate has been limited to 65,536 mb per tick.
Max Energy Transfer Rate has been limited to 65,536 FE per tick.
tooltips.enigmatica.base.altered_recipe_: Ricetta modificata per Enigmatica 6: Expert. Consulta JEI.
tooltips.enigmatica.base.tcon_anvil: Craftabile con blocchi di qualsiasi lega metallica.
tooltips.enigmatica.base.blast_upgrade: Rende i router immuni al Wither
tooltips.enigmatica.base.shield_block1: Le proiezioni scudo sono immuni al Wither
tooltips.enigmatica.base.quick_draw_anoi: Grants Quick-Draw on Bows and Crossbows
tooltips.enigmatica.base.holy_water_anoi: Grants bonus Smite damage on Melee Attacks.
tooltips.enigmatica.base.melee_anointmen: Grants bonus damage on Melee Attacks
tooltips.enigmatica.base.bow_power_anoin: Grants bonus damage on Bows and Crossbows
tooltips.enigmatica.base.hidden_knowledg: Grants bonus Experience from block harvests.
tooltips.enigmatica.base.bow_velocity_an: Grants additional projectile velocity on Bows and Crossbows
tooltips.enigmatica.base.beehive:
Tiered Beehives have been depreciated.
Use the Hive Upgrade items on nests found in the world instead.
Tiered Beehives can be converted to Hive Upgrades in a crafting grid.
tooltips.enigmatica.base.clockout_block: Emette un segnale di redstone quando il giocatore è online.
tooltips.enigmatica.base.soggy_treasure_: La serratura sembra rotta... cosa ci potrebbe essere dentro?
tooltips.enigmatica.base.mm_mana_port: Compatibile con Mana Spreaders e Sparks.
tooltips.enigmatica.base.amadron_survey_: Tools used by Amadron Drones to gather rare resources.
tooltips.enigmatica.base.monster_mash: mmmmm ammazza che buona la zuppa di mob
